introSection.title: Why partner with us?
items: Align with our mission to break barriers and advocate for gender equality in tech.
Engage in sponsorships, event collaborations, mentorship programs, and other programs.
Connect with and mentor talented women in tech.

items.name: SurrealDB
items.description: SurrealDB is an innovative, multi-model, cloud-ready database, suitable for modern and traditional applications.

items.name: Amazon
items.description: Amazon is a global leader in e-commerce, redefining online shopping with its vast product selection, seamless customer experience, and advanced logistics network.

items.name: JetBrains
items.description: JetBrains creates intelligent software development tools used by over 11.4 million professionals and 88 Fortune Global Top 100 companies.
